text: Swapna (born 6 September 1974) is the managing editor of the Telugu-language news channel 10TV. She is also a Telugu-language TV presenter who initially worked for Tv9 and is also a journalist. She is a well trained performer of Carnatic classical vocal and musical instruments. She hosted the Ramuism series with RGV. ==Early life== Swapna was born in Hyderabad to Jyotsna, a FM radio presenter known for the popular programme JAPA 4. Her maternal grandmother is a presenter of Radio Bhanumati of All India Radio. ==Career== Swapna started her career in TV anchoring with TV9 (Telugu) and hosted popular shows such as Shara Maamule. She later moved to radio as the regional programming head of BIG FM 92.7. == Filmography == {| class="wikitable" |+ !Year !Title !Role !Notes |- |2011 |Key |Candidate 9 | |- |2019 |Amma Rajyam Lo Kadapa Biddalu |Police inspector | |} ==References== Category:Living people Category:Indian women television journalists Category:Indian television journalists Category:Journalists from Andhra Pradesh Category:Indian women television presenters Category:Indian television presenters Category:1974 births Category:Television personalities from Andhra Pradesh Category:21st- century Indian women writers Category:21st-century Indian journalists Category:Writers from Hyderabad, India
title: Swapna (journalist)
